How to participate in Solana Hackathon

Аlexandr Kazakov
2022-03-14

Who

ℹ️ My name is Alexandr Kazakov I am a software engineer, full-stack web developer (Vue, React, Node.js), I also have a keen interest in blockchain more precisely it's Solana.

Solana Hackathon Rules

  • High quality code
  • Public repository with project code
  • Quality presentation
  • Live demo project
  • Project Community

About my Hackathon project

Project link https://solana.com/summercamp/voting/gbits-pay

Our team decided to participate in the 2022 Solana Hackathon, we decided to create the app that will scan QR codes to scan utility bills, bill in Solana, stabelcoins, SPL tokens, and make payments. We call it Gbits-Pay.

  • Project presentation
  • Live demo

Our project is written in Vuejs + Web3js to work with the Solana network. In the app the user logs in with his Solana Wallet e.g. Phantom, after which he can scan QR codes of bills and pay them. Payments can be made in Solana, Stablecoins like Solana USDT and SPL tokens. We participated in tracks: Web3js, Mobile and Payments.



At the moment the app works with Swiss utility bills. Example:

About Solana

It's good for the project community to have a blog, Twitter, communicate in the official Solana Discord, etc etc.

Participating in the Solana Hackathon is a great opportunity to test your skills, there is only one minus: the large number of participants, it's not easy to win.

Where can I access developer resources?

Check out the Resources section here. This page has all the tools, documentation, tutorials, and guides needed to start building today.

Where can I ask technical questions?

Head over to the #dev-questions channel in the Solana Hackathon Discord Serverhere

Can I meet up with other hackathon participants in real life?

Yes! Ecosystem teams around the world are hosting coworking spaces running concurrently with the hackathon. Each is sponsored by a Solana ecosystem project that will be helping you through your hackathon journey, from project idea to getting started building on Solana. RSVP for one the global locations atsolana.com/events

Where can I find project ideas?

While participants are encouraged to come up with novel concepts, Superteam has created a repository of project ideas
